Key Match Events: Juan Soto misplayed several balls in right field, including a fly ball by Brendan Donovan and a bases-clearing double by Lars Nootbaar.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said he didn't believe Soto should have caught Lars Nootbaar's decisive three-run double.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees lost 14-7 to the Cardinals, with the game being played on a wet field.
Others: The Yankees pitching staff is expected to get key additions this week, with Luis Gil and Clarke Schmidt set to throw their final rehab outings.
